text.tspan: Unit 19 'Economic inequality’ Section 19.2 'Accidents of birth: Another lens to study inequality' in The CORE
Team, The Economy. Available at https://tinyco.re/19020991 [Figure 19.11]
Data source: Corak (2013); Chen, Förster and Llena-Nozal (2013)
Note: Cross-sectional inequality (Gini coefficient) is displayed on the 'MAP' tab. CC-BY-ND-NC
